column3: Latest; (Phnom Penh): A Korean man was expelled from Cambodia at 21:30 on February 12
column6: male was handed over to representatives of the Korean Prosecutor General at Phnom Penh International Airport to answer charges of trafficking drugs from Cambodia to Korea. The suspect was arrested on December 5
column7: 2018 in Phnom Penh after appearing on an Interpol list. ------Source
